description.zh-cn: 中国导演、摄影师、演员，中国第五代导演代表人物之一。
description.en: A Chinese film director, producer, writer, and actor, and a representative figure of the Fifth Generation of Chinese filmmakers.

description.zh-cn: 中国陕西省省会，张艺谋的出生地。
description.en: The capital of Shaanxi Province, China, and the birthplace of Zhang Yimou.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋的母校，他于1978年进入该校摄影系进修。
description.en: Zhang Yimou's alma mater, where he studied in the Department of Cinematography starting in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Zhang Yimou.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋的第二任妻子，曾是无锡舞蹈团舞蹈演员。
description.en: The second wife of Zhang Yimou, formerly a dancer with the Wuxi Dance Troupe.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋与前妻肖华的女儿，电影导演、剪辑师。
description.en: Daughter of Zhang Yimou and his first wife Xiao Hua, a film director and editor.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名女演员，与张艺谋因拍摄《红高粱》相恋，并合作过多部电影。
description.en: A renowned Chinese actress who had a romantic relationship with Zhang Yimou after they met during the filming of 'Red Sorghum' and collaborated on numerous films.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋于1988年导演的电影，获得了第38届柏林国际电影节金熊奖。
description.en: A 1988 film directed by Zhang Yimou, which won the Golden Bear at the 38th Berlin International Film Festival.

description.zh-cn: 一场中国政治运动，在此期间，高中毕业的张艺谋到陕西农村“上山下乡”劳动。
description.en: A political movement in China during which Zhang Yimou, after graduating from high school, was sent to the countryside in Shaanxi for manual labor under the 'Up to the Mountains and Down to the Countryside Movement'.

zh-cn: 2008年夏季奥林匹克运动会开幕式

description.zh-cn: 2008年北京奥运会的开幕式，由张艺谋担任总导演。
description.en: The opening ceremony of the 2008 Beijing Olympic Games, for which Zhang Yimou served as the chief director.

nodes.id: 2022年冬季奥林匹克运动会开幕式

zh-cn: 2022年冬季奥林匹克运动会开幕式

description.zh-cn: 2022年北京冬奥会的开幕式，由张艺谋担任总导演。
description.en: The opening ceremony of the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympic Games, for which Zhang Yimou served as the chief director.

description.zh-cn: 日本著名演员，因主演电影《千里走单骑》与张艺谋结下深厚友谊。
description.en: A famous Japanese actor who developed a deep friendship with Zhang Yimou after starring in the film 'Riding Alone for Thousands of Miles'.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影制片人，曾与张艺谋合作16年，后因“矛盾”终止合作。
description.en: A Chinese film producer who collaborated with Zhang Yimou for 16 years before their partnership ended due to 'conflicts'.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋于1994年导演的电影，在中国大陆未获公映许可。
description.en: A 1994 film directed by Zhang Yimou, which was not approved for public release in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as 'China'.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省无锡市下辖的市辖区，其计生局曾就超生问题对张艺谋进行调查和处罚。
description.en: A district of Wuxi, Jiangsu, China, whose family planning bureau investigated and fined Zhang Yimou for exceeding birth quotas.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋于1950年4月2日出生于中国陕西省西安市。
description.en: Zhang Yimou was born in Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, China on April 2, 1950.

position.en: Advanced student in the Department of Cinematography

description.zh-cn: 1978年，张艺谋进入北京电影学院摄影系进修。
description.en: In 1978, Zhang Yimou began his studies in the Department of Cinematography at the Beijing Film Academy.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋与第一任妻子肖华于1978年结婚，1988年离婚。
description.en: Zhang Yimou married his first wife, Xiao Hua, in 1978 and they divorced in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋与陈婷在相恋多年并育有三名子女后，于2011年12月正式登记结婚。
description.en: After years of being together and having three children, Zhang Yimou and Chen Ting officially registered their marriage in December 2011.

description.zh-cn: 张末是张艺谋与前妻肖华的女儿。
description.en: Zhang Mo is the daughter of Zhang Yimou and his ex-wife Xiao Hua.

description.zh-cn: 张末是肖华与前夫张艺谋的女儿。
description.en: Zhang Mo is the daughter of Xiao Hua and her ex-husband Zhang Yimou.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋与巩俐因1987年拍摄电影《红高粱》相恋，他们的恋情于1995年结束。
description.en: Zhang Yimou and Gong Li fell in love during the filming of 'Red Sorghum' in 1987, and their relationship ended in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋于1988年导演了电影《红高粱》，该片使他在国际上声名大噪。
description.en: Zhang Yimou directed the film 'Red Sorghum' in 1988, which brought him international fame.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，张艺谋高中毕业后被迫中断正常的人生轨迹，到陕西农村“上山下乡”进行劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, after graduating from high school, Zhang Yimou was forced to interrupt his normal life path and was sent to the countryside in Shaanxi for manual labor under the 'Up to the Mountains and Down to the Countryside Movement'.

relationships.target: 2008年夏季奥林匹克运动会开幕式

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋担任2008年北京奥运会开闭幕式的总导演，获得了极高的声誉。
description.en: Zhang Yimou served as the chief director for the opening and closing ceremonies of the 2008 Beijing Olympics, earning immense prestige.

relationships.target: 2022年冬季奥林匹克运动会开幕式

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋担任2022年北京冬奥会和冬残奥会开闭幕式总导演，成为世界首位“双奥”总导演。
description.en: Zhang Yimou served as the chief director for the opening and closing ceremonies of the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics and Paralympics, becoming the world's first 'Dual Olympic' chief director.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋和高仓健因合作电影《千里走单骑》而结下深厚友谊。
description.en: Zhang Yimou and Ken Takakura formed a deep friendship through their collaboration on the film 'Riding Alone for Thousands of Miles'.

description.zh-cn: 在合作16年后，张艺谋与制片人张伟平因“矛盾”于2012年左右终止了合作关系。
description.en: After 16 years of collaboration, Zhang Yimou and producer Zhang Weiping ended their partnership around 2012 due to 'conflicts'.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋导演的电影《活着》因其内容涉及历次政治运动，至今未在中国大陆获准公映。
description.en: The film 'To Live', directed by Zhang Yimou, has not been approved for public release in mainland China to this day due to its content involving various political movements.

description.zh-cn: 无锡市滨湖区计生局因张艺谋与陈婷婚前生育三个子女违反计划生育政策，对其展开调查并最终征收共计748万余元人民币的社会抚养费。
description.en: The Family Planning Bureau of Binhu District, Wuxi, investigated Zhang Yimou for violating family planning policies by having three children with Chen Ting before their marriage, ultimately imposing a social maintenance fee totaling over 7.48 million RMB.
